Crimes.Legal_Issue: Does the Applicant have a legal right to meaningful access to financial records and participation in Band Council meetings?
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant was denied full access to financial records and excluded from meetings; Respondents failed to justify restrictions legally or practically.
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Applicant is entitled to meaningful access to financial records and participation in all Band Council meetings, including teleconferences.
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Access to records and meeting participation
Crimes.Court_Ruling: Court ordered Respondents to provide access to records and meeting participation.
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Denied access and excluded Applicant without legal justification
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Dispute over Applicant's rights as a Councillor after being restricted by Chief and Council
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review application filed, hearings held, evidence reviewed
Crimes.Application_Basis: Councillors must oversee finances and attend meetings
Crimes.Relief_Sought: Meaningful access to information and participation
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Councillors must oversee finances and review records
Crimes.Cause_Description: Dispute over Applicant's rights as a Councillor after being restricted by Chief and Council
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Based on submitted evidence and arguments
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Applicant has a right to participate and access records under the Procedural Manual

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the Band Council violate the Election Procedures Act by failing to call a special election after the Chief's resignation?
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Court reviewed materials and heard submissions
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: The Band Council breached the EPA by not calling a special election.
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On the Applicant to demonstrate breach
Crimes.Legal_Rule: A special election must be called if the Chief's office becomes vacant more than six months before the next regular election.
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to follow mandatory election procedures
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Resignation of Chief Evans and subsequent appointment of Acting Chief without holding a special election
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Resignation date, election schedule, council actions
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Justified based on convenience and policy
Crimes.Outcome: Court declared failure unlawful and ordered compliance
Crimes.Jurisdiction: Norway House Cree Nation Band Council
